name: Banner House
description:
You are the leader of a mercenary band, and it's up to YOU to manage and maintain your units to become the best mercenary company of the land.

Start from the bottom and work your way to the top of the rankings! Loyalty and dedication to the growth of your units is the key.

The mercenaries of the land all fight for their own reasons and with their own strengths. 

Gather invitations to recruit powerful allies!

MAQTANIS

A fair-minded lion warrior whose power is as strong as his heart. He acts as a mighty protection for his teammates.

 

MERADIATH 

A half-elf notorious for his musical prowess and flamboyant personality. He inspires his allies with both empowering and defensive buffs.

VIINA

A reserved skeptic of an assassin who measures twice before cutting once. A hothead when provoked, but levelheaded enough to provide the best offense for her team.

Combat simulation
